artist.name: Synthetic
artist.summary: Synthetic was formed in the late 90's by Steve Engler (formerly of Primitive Modern, Twitch Revolt & Domestic Violence), Synthetic is an eclectic act. Influences range from Aphex Twin to Frank Zappa and everything in between. Currently has 3 remixes on Bush-of-ghosts.com under artist names: AAASYNTHETIC and STEVEEDENVER. Has several remixes on RealWorldRemixed.com (Peter Gabriel's Label). Also is he represented on mp3unsigned.com as Synthetic. Synthetic has completed 5 LPs and 8-10 EPs.
